scripts.convert-postman-k6: npm run convert && postman-to-k6 k6/marvel.postman.json -o k6/marvel.k6.js
scripts.convert-postman-k6-extra: npm run convert && postman-to-k6 k6/marvel.postman.json --cli-options-file config/k6-cli-config.json
scripts.run-k6-report: K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=report/report-graph.html k6 run k6/marvel.k6.js && npm run generate-report && npm run open-report
scripts.run-k6-breakit: K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=report/report-graph.html k6 run k6/marvel.k6.js --vus 1000 --duration 10s && npm run generate-report && npm run open-report
scripts.run-k6-50rps: K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=report/report-graph.html K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_OPEN=true k6 run k6/marvel.k6.js --config config/options/30s_50rps.json && npm run generate-report && npm run open-report
